title: I-30 Tom Landry Highway Photo Archive
text: These archive photos show views of Tom Landry Highway around SH 360 before completion of expansion projects and the interchange at SH 360.

images.caption: Looking west at 19th Street in Grand Prairie. The is now the center of the five-level Bush Turnpike interchange. At the time of  this photo in 2007, frontage roads for SH 161 were under constructio. A pier and abutments are visible for the southbound 161 frontage road just ahead.

imageStatus.note: This spot is now in the middle of the Bush Turnpike interchange.

images.caption: Looking west at Great Southwest Parkway. At the time of the photo in 2007, the freeway was still in its original configuration from 1957. In 2015 work began on a four-level interchange just ahead at SH 360, and it was completed in December 2023, including substantial widening of the freeway at this location.

imageStatus.note: In 2015 work began on the new interchange at SH 360. The project includes rebuilding and widening this section of freeway.

images.caption: The SH 360 Freeway, named the Angus Wynne Freeway, is just ahead. From the highway opening until 2015, vehicles connecting to SH 360 had to exit to a signalized intersection. In 2015 work began on a new interchange which was completed in December 2023.

imageStatus.note: Lanes have been added and work began in 2015 on a four-level interchange at SH 360. The interchange was completed in December 2023.

images.caption: Looking southwest, showing Six Flags Over Texas along the south side of the freeway.

imageStatus.note: In 2015 construction began on a four-level interchange at SH 360. The project includes widening the main lanes in the area of this view.

images.caption: The original Ballpark Way the westbound frontage road featured a strange dead-end with a loop turnaround.

imageStatus.note: This section of freeway was widened, reconfigured and sunk into a trench in a project completed in 2010

images.caption: Looking west at Ballpark Way, showing the original freeway. The expanded freeway at this location was completed in 2010.

imageStatus.note: This section of freeway was widened, reconfigured and sunk into a trench in a project completed in 2010

images.caption: Looking west at the original freeway at Collins

imageStatus.note: This section of freeway was widened, reconfigured and sunk into a trench in a project completed in 2010
